org.gimp.GIMP.Plugin.LiquidRescale org.gimp.GIMP LiquidRescale LiquidRescale GIMP Plugin
LiquidRescale plugin to resize pictures non uniformly while preserving their features, i.e. avoiding distortion of the important parts.
